name: paladin - majasaFirebrand
mods: on melee wep hit, 20% chance to inflict 2 $nonPhysType DoT, stacking until CON save

name: paladin - divineBolt
mods: on melee wep hit, 20% chance to cast spell bolt atk on nearest foe, dealing 0 $nonPhysType

name: paladin - flash of brilliance
mods: on hit, 20% chance to blind target until end of your next turn

name: paladin - prayer
mods: if you've used a healing power since start of your last turn, +1 global dmg and +1 outgoing healing

name: paladin - staunch defender
mods: +1 phys res while holding a shield
+1 spell dmg while holding a shield

name: paladin - faith armour
mods: 20% chance to negate extra crit dmg

name: paladin - penance
mods: on melee wep or thrown hit, 30% chance to give 1 $physType DoT, stacking until CON save
on taking melee wep hit, 20% chance to gain 1 {physType} DoT, stacking until CON save

name: paladin - righteous firebrand
mods: if you've cast a spell since start of your last turn, add 1d4 $nonPhysType dmg to your melee wep hits

name: paladin - divine essence
mods: on using healing power, 20% chance to gain +1 phys res, +1 outgoing healing, and +1 to saves to end ongoing effects for combat

name: acolyte - dark rituals
mods: if you've summoned a minion this combat, this dmg bonus also applies to you

name: acolyte - mania of mortality
mods: whenever an adj creature dies or goes down, 20% chance to gain 6 temp HP

name: acolyte - putrid demise
mods: on KB, 20% chance for foes adj to corpse to gain 1 $nonPhysType DoT, stacking until CON save

name: acolyte - eye of damnation
mods: on hit, 20% chance to give 1 {nonPhysType} DoT, stacking until CON save

name: primalist - primal medicine
mods: on 1+ healing surge, minions heal 2 HP

name: primalist - harmony of blades
upgrade: -1 dmg res and +3 {weaponClass} dmg ALT -1 dmg res and +3 {weaponClass} dmg

name: primalist - tempest bond
mods: all above bonuses are doubled while you have a minion

name: sentinel - overwhelm
mods: on melee hit, 10% chance to stun until end of target's next turn

name: sentinel - axe thrower
mods: 1/turn, on hit, 10% chance to throw piercing wep atk at nearest target, dealing 1d4 $physType

name: mage - preparation
mods: first $dmgPolarity spell each turn deals +2 dmg
first {dmgPolarity} spell each turn has 20% chance to slow until end of your next turn on hit

name: mage - rune of winter
mods: your $nonPhysType and $nonPhysType spells are converted to $nonPhysType and gain 20% chance on hit to paralyse until end of your next turn

name: mage - sun and storms
mods: 1/combat, on {nonPhysType1} power use, gain 2 temp HP
1/combat, on {nonPhysType2} power use, gain 2 temp HP
two above mods stack their temp HP together

name: mage - ice and fire
mods: on {nonPhysType1} hit, 20% chance to inflict sluggish until end of your next turn
on {nonPhysType2} hit, 20% chance to give 1 {nonPhysType2} DoT, stacking until CON save

name: shaman - shamanic infusion
mods: you and your minions ignore $physType, $nonPhysType, and $nonPhysType res

mods: on hit, 20% chance to stun until end of target's next turn
on minion hit, 20% chance to stun until end of target's next turn

name: shaman - silent protector
mods: while you have a minion, +1 phys res

name: shaman - tempest form
mods: on hit, 20% chance to give -1 dmg res until end of your next turn
on hit, 20% chance to inflict sluggish until end of your next turn

name: shaman - lagonian wrath
mods: when hit, 20% chance to cast spell atk on hitter, dealing 1d4 {nonPhysType}

name: shaman - earthern supremacy
mods: on hit, 20% chance to stun until end of target's next turn

name: shaman - ancestral speed
mods: on summoning minion, +5' sp until end of turn

name: shaman - glacial strike
mods: first melee hit each turn deals extra 1d4 $nonPhysType dmg

name: shaman - protective circle
mods: while you have a minion, +1 $physType res
while you have a minion, +2 non-phys res

name: shaman - lagon's answer
mods: on spell cast, 20% chance to cast spell atk on spell target, dealing 1d4 $nonPhysType

name: shaman - sky armour
mods: when hit, 20% chance to give hitter sluggish until end of your next turn
when hit, 20% chance to give hitter -1 dmg res until end of your next turn

name: shaman - ascendant circle
mods: while you have a minion, +2 spell dmg

mods: on hit, 20% chance to gain +5' sp until end of your next turn

name: beastmaster - life in the wilderness
